animeDescription: With his parents abroad and his house in renovation all of a sudden, Kouta Kazama ends up staying at the home of his neighbor, Aki Hayama, sharing a room with her. Being childhood friends, they used to be very close, but now, as a man and woman sleeping together, it might not take too long for them to realize their true feelings for each other.[Written by MAL Rewrite]
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Aibeya: Osananajimi no Ie de, Honto no Koi wo Shiru Tame no Dousei Seikatsu', 'Other: Aikagi The Animation']
